body.name: Newbealer Steamer for Clothes, 700W Handheld Garment Steamer (Vertical Only), Wrinkles Remover for Clothing, 180ml, Portable for Home, Office and Travel

features: Powerful & Gentle: 700W Fabric Steamer produces powerful steam within 2 minutes. Hot Steam At 212°F Is A Proven Deep Cleanser For Clothes And Other Surfaces. Gently iron all your clothes, curtains, sheets, and more.

Big Capacity & Vertical Steaming Only: With a 180ML big capacity Water Tank, it can provide 10 minutes of continuous steam, reducing the annoyance of adding water frequently. Two sides transparent water level and the unique Silicone Water tank Cap make it convenient to add water. Note: Keep the steamer always upright to prevent spills.

SAFETY IS PRIORITY: Manufactured Under Strict Safety Guidelines. One-button Switch allows you to control the steamer conveniently! Please turn off the clothes steamer when it not in use and when water running out. Please note that the steamer can only be used with 110- to 125V outlets. Under the conditions of 220-240V, a transformer and adapter plug are required.

Portable & Effective: Forget heavy irons, this compact and light-weight vertical steamer is easy to store in any suitcase or carry-on luggage. 8.2ft Power Cord, never worry about operating steamer remotely. Instantly Erase All Wrinkles From Your Favorite Suit, Shirt, And Dress! Don’t Let Annoying Creases Ruin Your Events Or Trips.

Ideal Gift: Newbealer handheld garment steamer is suitable for all fabrics. Everybody definitely needs an effective steamer! With a 1-Year Warranty and a customer care team always ready to smooth things over, shop it with confidence.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: No water leaks Equipped with a rotatable silicone tank cap, which can accurately block the opening to avoid leaks.Open the cap counterclockwise to add water. Push Button Switch Easy-to-access push button switch with indicator light, slide it upwards to turn on the machine for a continuous flow of steam. Compact and ideal for travel Compact and lightweight for effortless storage in your suitcase.Suitable for home, office, and travel, meeting all your garment care needs. 212°F Hot Steam 212℉ Hot Steam ensures you smooth the fabric quickly, it also can deep clean and get rid of odors present on clothes at the same time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is my first purchase of this product. It got great reviews and that’s why I purchased this particular model. It heats up quickly and stays hot. There was very little water droplets. It worked ok on a blouse and dress. I don’t use it that often but I will take it with me when I travel. B.D. Dallas,Yx

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works like an iron….

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars You get what you paid for
reviews.reviewText: I bought this product in July but did not use it till August. My first time using it, it worked for approximately 10-15 minutes and then water starting leaking out the back where the electrical cord is. This was definitely a safety hazard since I did not realize why it wasn’t working till 5 minutes later. I could have been electrocuted because the water was slowly leaking out right on top of the cord while it was still plugged in. I definitely don’t recommend buying this product and I wish I could get my money back, but unfortunately I can’t since it’s past the refund window.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product. It works well. You just have to be very careful not to burn yourself with the hot water.
